HAYWARDS HEATH - AN INTRODUCTION
HAYWARDS HEATH IS A RESIDENTIAL TOWN SITUATED IN MID SUSSEX CLOSE TO THE MAIN COASTAL TOWN OF BRIGHTON WITH LONDON APPROXIMATELY AN HOUR BY RAIL. MANY PEOPLE STILL COMMUTE TO LONDON BY TRAIN EACH DAY ALTHOUGH THERE IS INCREASING OFFICE DEVELOPMENT PROVIDING SOME LOCAL EMPLOYMENT.TRANSPORTSERVICES ARE EXCELLENT PROVIDING TRAINS, BUSES AND TAXIS WITH GATWICK AIRPORT AND SEALINK FERRIES EASILY ACCESSIBLE. THE TOWN IS MODERATELY LARGE WWITH ALL KINDS OF FACILITIES WHICH INCLUDE A SHOPPING CENTRE, SPORTS CLUB PUBLIC PARKS, CATTLE MARKET AND HEALTH SERVICES.SOME LEISURE ACTIVITIES OFFERED AT LOCAL RECREATION CENTRES ARE SQUASH,SWIMMING ,GOLF TENNIS, CRICKET AND BOWLING.
